doc:
Herbert Anderson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_Anderson 0 Herbert Anderson (March 30, 1917 – June 11, 1994) was an American character actor from Oakland, California, probably best remembered for his role as Henry Mitchell, the father, in the CBS television sitcom Dennis the Menace, which was based on the Hank Ketcham comic strip of the same name. Herbert_Anderson ( March_30_,_1917 – June_11_,_1994 ) was an_American_character_actor from Oakland , California , probably best_remembered for his_role as Henry_Mitchell , the_father , in the_CBS_television_sitcom_Dennis the_Menace , which was_based on the_Hank_Ketcham_comic_strip of the_same_name .
